snippet: Andy Murray warmed up for the Australian Open, which begins Jan. 16, with a commanding 6-1, 6-3 victory over third-seeded Alexandr Dolgopolov in the Brisbane International final.
abstract: Andy Murray defeats Alexandr Dolgopolov to win tennis's Brisbane International, a tuneup for the Australian Open; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray warmed up for the Australian Open, which begins Jan. 16, with a commanding 6-1, 6-3 victory over third-seeded Alexandr Dolgopolov in the Brisbane International final.
